attributes.action: Grant compensation to students who are studying at University
attributes.additional_details: We need the government and the universities to offer a compensation payment to students who will no longer have the full university experience. It is important for students to know exactly what the university uses their tuition fees for as the students will be paying it back with interest.
attributes.background: Students are going back to university after the global pandemic. The vast majority of these students will be working from home, therefore they will not be using all of the resources that they are paying their university for. Uni's and the government should offer compensation payments to students.
